channel.title: Mail Attachments Plus on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Mail Attachments Plus on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: New and planned
item.description: New and planned Planned features for future versions Attachment functionality on furhter levels Version 2.2.0.0 - 06.01.2023 Implementation of new license check. Version 2.0.0.1 from 04.11.2022 Improved form for license orders Version 2.0.0.0 Attachments will now be considered when using Connector 365 Easy Batch Dependency from the new version of app Connector 365 Base (2.0.0.0) Version 1.0.0.12 New permission sets C365 View C365 Edit C365 Setup Dependency on Connector 365 Base app version 1.

item.title: Videos
item.description: Videos Here you can find some informative videos about our Mail Attachments Plus App, each video covers a special topic Using the App
